attributes.action: Provide advice and finacial support for the over 40's long term disabled to return to work or start their own business
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Once you are 40 or over and on disability benifit it is very hard to start working again as many disabled people like me are well enough to work some days but never no which ones, this makes us unemployable. We want to work but there is no help to set-up your own business to use the experiance and training from previous employment and education to return to work and  contribute to society.
